name: BytePitch - Software Labs
description:
BytePitch is a result-driven and quality oriented team that is passionate about product and software development.
We provide services on product development, cloud-based systems and software development, thus we follow the agile software development principles ( http://agilemanifesto.org/ ) which sets as higher priority the satisfaction of the client by using short and continuous deliveries of valuable software.
Software Consulting - Remote and on-site software consulting services based on our experience building high reliable and scalable systems.
Product Lab - Based on our experience in real estate, couponing and food delivery, we provide business value from the first release.
